text: @realDonaldTrump I tried to apply for the PPP loan, but no reply due to OUT of FUND. My Democratic Governor keeps state shutdown forever. All the regular clinics are closed. I am running out of my ARRHYTHMIA medication. I will probably either die of STARVE or HEART ATTACK before coronavirus.
